data.text: “O ofa gamir gumaziba, ia akar kam baragh.
Ia Efraimia ko Israelia, kɨ ian arazibagh fo.
Israelia uan God ategha asebar ziaba fema,
Israelian arazir uari fem, a me isa kot gatɨ.
Ikiavɨra Itir God me ategha gɨfa.
Bar guizbangɨra, me Ikiavɨra Itir God ategha gɨfa,
Ia Gibean gumaziba, ko Raman gumaziba, ko Betelɨn gumaziba ko Benjaminɨn anabamɨn gumaziba,
Dughiar kamra ia Efraimia bar ikuvigham.
Efraimia uan atrivimɨn akar gavgavimɨn gɨn ghua marvir guar kɨnibar ziaba fe.
Kamaghɨra, kɨ Efraimia ko Judaba vɨrara me gasɨghasigham,
“Efraimia uarir gara fo, me puv arei.
Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn bar gavgavigh laionɨn gavgavimɨn mɨn otogh
“Kɨ uan gumazamiziba ategh uamategh uan nguibamɨn mangam.
